string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide : Puppy\n

string.name: text
string.value:
Pet Level : 1 ~ 30
sit bad|no|badgirl|badboy
stupid|ihateyou|baddog|dummy
iloveyou pee

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 11 ~ 30\ntalk|chat|say|bark down

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 21 ~ 30\nup|stand|rise

string.name: text
string.value: If pet's level reaches 15, you may order pet to say certain lines by using #b/pet#k command.

string.name: text
string.value: Visit the Pet Trainer or Pet Food Merchant to buy food for your pet. Then use pet commands to increase intimacy with your pet.

string.name: text
string.value: Scroll of Switch Pet Ability

string.name: text
string.value: \nThis scroll allows one to transfer a pet's ability points (level + closeness) to any other pet.

string.name: text
string.value: But just having this scroll does not guarantee the change in ability points between the pets.

string.name: text
string.value: Doing so requires a noble sacrifice and a holy procedure. This procedure can only be taken place with #rMar the Fairy#k in Ellinia.

string.value: You can revive an expired pet with the #bWater of Life#k from the #bCash Shop#k. Double-click on it, and select the pet you'd like to revive.

string.name: text
string.value: Feeding your pet will solidify the bond between you! The pet tamer and the pet food merchant both sell food that will increase Closeness.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide: Pink Bean\n

string.value:

sit
slap, no, bad, don't
iloveyou

string.value:

play
sleep, sleepy, zzz, goodnight
talk, chat, say

string.name: text
string.value: Pet level: 20 to 30\nshowoff, trick, perform

string.name: text
string.value: Tip: You can control what your pet says when it reaches Lv. 15.\n #bExample) /pet [What you want your pet to say]#k

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

Pet Level: 10 to 30
poop

string.name: text
string.value: Tip. When your pet reaches Level 15, you can train him to say specific words. \n #bExample: /pet [word]#k

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Notice

string.name: text
string.value: \nA wonderful pet that will keep you company for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: You can revive an expired pet by getting #bWater of Life#k from the Fairy in #bMar's Forest#k or the Wisp at the #bEos Tower Entrance#k in Ludibrium.

string.name: text
string.value: Feeding your pet will solidify the bond between you! The pet tamer and the pet food merchant both sell food that will increase Closeness.

string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

string.value:

sit
slap, no, bad, don't
iloveyou

string.name: text
string.value:
Pet level: 10 to 30
sleep, sleepy, zzz, goodnight
talk, chat, say
poop

string.name: text
string.value: Tip: You can control what your pet says when it reaches Lv. 15.\n #bExample) /pet [What you want your pet to say]#k

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: It'll serve as a lovely pet to you for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: When 90 days have passed and your pet has turned into a doll, you can purchase the #bWater of Life#k to reawaken your pet. Training your pet by using commands or developing closeness by feeding your pet will increase your pet's level.

string.value: Pet Level : 1 ~ 30\nsit rest bad|no|badgirl|badboy\npoop iloveyou up|stand

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 10 ~ 30\ntalk|say|chat play

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 20 ~ 30\nsleep|sleepy|gotobed

string.name: text
string.value: If pet's level reaches 15, you may order pet to say certain lines by using #b/pet#k command.

string.name: text
string.value: Visit the Pet Trainer or Pet Food Merchant to buy food for your pet. Then use pet commands to increase intimacy with your pet.

string.value: Pet Notice

string.name: text

string.name: text
string.value: Feeding your pet will solidify the bond between you! The pet tamer and the pet food merchant both sell food that will increase Closeness.

string.name: text
string.value: 펫에 대한 알림문

string.name: text
string.value: \n30여일간 당신의 곁에서 사랑스러운 펫으로 지낼 것입니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 생명수가 다 마르면 당신은 #b생명수#k를 구해 #b마르의 숲#k에 있는 요정을 만나거나 루디브리엄의 #b에오스탑 입구#k에 있는 위습을 만나 펫을 부활시킬 수도 있습니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 조련사나 펫 먹이 상인을 찾아가 펫의 먹이를 먹이고 명령어를 사용하여 펫과의 친밀도를 높여보세요.

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 명령어 안내서 : 무적의 디저트 편\n

string.name: text
string.value:
펫 레벨 : 1 ~ 30
앉아
때찌,안돼,혼난다,혼날래
자자, 졸립지, 쿨쿨, 잘자
사랑해,좋아해,내사랑

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 레벨 : 10 ~ 30\n말해봐,말해,말해줘

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 레벨 : 20 ~ 30\n춤출래, 춤춰\n변신

string.name: text
string.value: Tip. 펫의 레벨이 15가 되면 특정 말을 하도록 시킬 수 있습니다. \n #b예) /펫 [할 말]#k

string.value: You can revive an expired pet with the #bWater of Life#k from the #bCash Shop#k. Double-click on it, and select the pet you'd like to revive.

string.name: text
string.value: Feeding your pet will solidify the bond between you! The pet tamer and the pet food merchant both sell food that will increase Closeness.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide: Gym Cat\n

string.value:
Pet Level: 1 to 30

slap, no, bad, don't
iloveyou

string.name: text
string.value:
Pet level: 10 to 30
punch
sleep, sleepy, zzz, goodnight
talk, chat, say

string.name: text
string.value: Tip: You can control what your pet says when it reaches Lv. 15.\n #bExample) /pet [What you want your pet to say]#k

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 10 ~ 30\ntalk|say|chat play melong

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 20 ~ 30\nsleep|sleepy|gotobed

string.name: text
string.value: If pet's level reaches 15, you may order pet to say certain lines by using #b/pet#k command.

string.name: text
string.value: Visit the Pet Trainer or Pet Food Merchant to buy food for your pet. Then use pet commands to increase intimacy with your pet.

string.name: text
string.value: Gwin's Diary

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bThe first page of the diary...#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #L7##bTo the last page of the diary#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: April 29th, 2006.\nWeather : Pretty much sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I have finally arrived the world of MapleStory. Through meeting new people, which included chatting and even receiving some help from them, I was able to reach a town called Amherst.\r\nJudging by the weak monsters showing up outside town, it doesn't seem like it's as dangerous as the place was made out to be...

string.name: text
string.value: May 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Pretty much Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: The great weather seemed to be the norm here these days. \n\nI went around town for the past few days and this place is very peaceful.

string.name: text
string.value: June 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Partly Cloudy

string.name: text
string.value: I ran into Manji, and I was immediately taken aback by his cocky attitude, as if I shouldn't even be talking to him. Did a famous warrior get hit or something, just like John said? Anyway, I decided to roam around Perion.\nI met Ayan, a little girl. She's pale white, and yet she's dressed up as a native Indian, as if she's the chief's daughter. She may grow up to be quite a hottie...haha.

string.name: text
string.value: August 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Snowing in El Nath, even in the summer!

string.name: text
string.value: I'm still not used to this. Everytime I feel warm and fuzzy in Orbis with a warm breeze hitting me, I'll feel the icy coldness that penetrates my body once I get to El Nath.

string.name: text
string.value: A very disdainful old lady tried to see my horoscope by grabbing my hand and dragging me to her house, that I ran away to El Nath, eventhough I was ill-prepared for the coldness that surely greeted us. Thanks to that escape, I caught a very nasty fever, and I am currently recuperating at Jade's house.

string.name: text
string.value: August 10th, 2006.\nWeather : Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I finally heard about a monster named Balrog. It looks like my first order of business is to kill it. Now, to get to Balrog ... go past the Ant Tunnel ... someone told me this place has a humongous door... oh well, I don't care, wouldn't I get there just by going deep into the Ant Tunnel?\nI better go to Manji first and get myself healed...

string.name: text
string.value: #eBeginner's Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Content
#L1##b1. What's a Beginner?#k#l
#L3##b2. Basic Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What are Items?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l
#L14##b5. What's a Job Advancement?#k#l
#L15##b6. 1st Job Advancement : How?#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1. What's a Beginner?

string.name: text
string.value: A beginner may not strike fear into anyone, but the potential is limitless. The abilities may not be there just yet, so the beginners spend the majority of the time at Maple Island training for the big time.

string.name: text
string.value: Once the training in Maple Island is complete, move to Victoria Island for a whole new set of competition, bigger world to play around with and job advancement.

string.name: text
string.value: Even the very best at one went through growing pains of being a beginner. Please train diligently to become a significant player yourself!

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2-1. Basic Controls : Control

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft, Right Arrow#n : Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n : Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE#n: Opening equipment window
#eI#n: Opening item window
#eS#n: Opening ability window
#eK#n: Opening skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, allot one of the HotKey's with a 'use' item or a skill to have easy access to the item or the skill.

string.name: text
string.value: 2-2. Basic Controls : Command

string.name: text
string.value: Enter these commands in the chat window to use these functions

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n : Chat in regular method.
#e/buddy#n : Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n : Talk to your party members.
#e/guild#n : Talk to your guild members.
#e/whisper [character name]#n : whisper to a particular user.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n : Checks the availability of the character / notifies the current place the character is in.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Request for a trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/partyinfo#n : Check out the information on the party members currently signed up in the party.
#e/makeparty#n : Create a new party.
#e/leaveparty#n : Leave the current party.
#e/partyexpell#n : Forcefully expells a party member.#b(Party Leader)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 3. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Item#n\n An item that can be equipped. Consists of a regular equipment item, which boosts the character's abillities, and cash item, which is geared more towards the appearance.

string.name: text
string.value: To equp an equipment item, open the equipment window and drag the item to the slot, or double-click on the item

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Item#n\n These items consist of potions that help recover HP and/or MP, scrolls that upgrade the equipment items, and other 1-time items. Double-click on the item to use it, and the item will disappear following its use.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc. Item#n\n These items consist of monster leftovers, quest items, ores, jewels, and other items. Etc. items cannot be used by itself,

string.name: text
string.value: but they are pivotal in completing quests and other missions in the game.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Item#n\n Items that can be purchased in Cash Shop. Primarily for appearance, as well as some visual effects.#rCash Items cost money, and Cash can be charged to purchase these items.#k

string.name: text
string.value: 4. AP and SP

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be allocated to one of these categories: Strength(STR), Dexterity(DEX), Intelligence(INT), Luck(LUK), MaxHP, MaxMP. Earns 5 points for every level up.

string.name: text
string.value: #bStrength(STR)#k - Essential to carry around heavy armors and weapons. Most important to the warriors, for it directly determines the level of attack the warrior performs.

string.name: text
string.value: #bDexterity(DEX)#k - The higher this stat, the higher the accuracy and avoidability. The number one factor in determining the level of attack for bowmen.

string.name: text
string.value: #bIntelligence(INT)#k - The higher this stat, the better magic attacks get, as well as affecting the Max MP if AP is used in this stat. The number one factor in determining the mage's Magic Attack.

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #bLuck(LUK)#k - The higher this stat is, the higher the avoidability, as well as a decrease in the EXP suffered from dying during the game. The number one factor in determining the level of attack for thieves.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nThese points are earned after the 1st job advancement, and the points can be allocated towards skills available for the job. Each subsequent level-up will give 3 skill points.

string.name: text
string.value: 5. What's a Job Advancement?

string.name: text
string.value: When you reach milestone levels, you can take a Job Advancement and gain access to new skills! \nReach Lv. 10 for your 1st Job Advancement, Lv. 30 for your 2nd Job Advancement, Lv. 60 for your 3rd Job Advancement, and Lv.100 for your 4th Job Advancement#k.

string.name: text
string.value: 6. 1st Job Advancement : How?

string.name: text
string.value: To make the 1st job advancement, first leave Maple Island and head over to Victoria Island.

string.name: text
string.value: To reach the Victoria Island, pay 150 mesos at Southperry and get on board the ship that heads to Lith Harbor.

string.name: text
string.value: Once at Lith Harbor, either take a cab or walk to each of these towns for the job advancement.

string.name: text
string.value: (1)#e Warrior#n\n#rLevel 10 and over.#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bDances with Balrog#k at Perion to learn a thing or two about becoming a true warrior.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eBowman#n\n#rLevel 10 and over.#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bAthena Pierce#k at Henesys and learn what it's like to be the true bowman.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eThief#n\n#rLevel 10 and over.#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bDark Lord#k of Kerning City and pick up aspects of what it's like to live in the dark, becoming a true thief in the process.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Magician#n\n#rLevel 8 and over.#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bGrendel the Really Old#k of Ellinia and learn the ins and outs of becoming a true magician.

string.name: text
string.value: (5)#ePirate#n\n#rLevel 10 and over.#k Once he criteria is met, meet #bKyrin#k at Nautilus and learn what it's like to be a true pirate.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k It is strongly recommended that the job advancement takes place as soon as your character is at an eligible level.

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: Once the job advancement takes place, new skills can be mastered, occupational weapons will be available, HP and MP will increase, and attack + defense will improve.

string.name: text
string.value: #b메이플스토리 3주년#k

string.name: text
string.value: \n메이플스토리 3주년을 기념하여 엘리니아의 대마법사 하인즈님께서 성실한 여행자를 위해 선물을 준비하셨다고 합니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 여행자님의 성실함을 증명할 수 있는 도장을 출석확인 책에 찍어 드릴테니 하인즈님을 찾아가 보시기 바랍니다.

string.name: text
string.value: #b하인즈의 전언#k

string.name: text
string.value: #n메이플 월드가 생겨난지도 벌써 3년이 지났군..

string.name: text
string.value: 지난 3년동안 꾸준히 메이플스토리에 대한 사랑과 관심을 보여준 것에 대해 깊히 감사하고 있네..

string.name: text
string.value: 그런 의미에서 성실한 메이플 여행자에게 선물을 준비하였으니 어서 나를 찾아오게나.

string.name: text
string.value: April 16th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : I have finally started writing a diary.

string.name: text
string.value: The Owl of Minerva brought me some news. Apparently, there's a major movement amongst the humans in regards to writing a diary everyday. As a goddess who needs to set a positive example to the humans, I have decided to follow suit. Truth be told, I'm already worried about writing an entry everyday.

string.name: text
string.value: I have decided to keep a journal but writing a journal entry everyday is not as easy as I thought it would be.

string.name: text
string.value: April 19th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : My Statue

string.name: text
string.value: The humans elected a huget tower as well as build a statue of my likeness.

string.name: text
string.value: For them to make a beautiful statue out of these rocks made me realize how brilliant the humans are with their ability to create something. I was so impressed by the statue that I have decided to keep it inside my tower.

string.name: text
string.value: April 23rd

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Lazy Afternoon...

string.name: text
string.value: \nIt's been a habit of mine lately to start each morning by staring at my statue while drinking tea. The more I look at it, the more I like how the statue resembles me a lot.

string.name: text
string.value: For humans to create a statue of my likeness with rocks... it still blows my mind.

string.name: text
string.value: April 24th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Unwelcome Guest

string.name: text
string.value: \nToday, Papa Pixie came by for a visit wearing this round, weird-looking hat. He came wanting to buy some Water of Life so he can raise more Pixies.

string.name: text
string.value: I had to sternly tell him that the Water of Life is not for sale, much to his chagrin.

string.name: text
string.value: April 27th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Busted Statue of Goddess

string.name: text
string.value: \n Today was a really rough day.

string.name: text
string.value: I heard a crack in the middle of the night, so I woke up only to find out my statue has been busted. Next to the crumbled statue was a footprint.

string.name: text
string.value: How dare that person to walk into my tower and have the audacity to break my statue!!

string.name: text
string.value: April 28th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Papa Pixie's 2nd Visit

string.name: text
string.value: \nPapa Pixie, who came by a couple of days ago wanting the Water of Life, came back again, asking if I was interested in selling that water.

string.name: text
string.value: Amazingly, Papa Pixie offered to help fix the statue, which I was glad to hear. But then again, how did he know that the statue was busted in the first place?

string.name: text
string.value: April 30th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : A Visit by Human

string.name: text
string.value: \nToday, the humans paid a visit to the tower. I didn't want them to see the busted statue, so I had to hurriedly cover it up with some cloth.

string.name: text
string.value: Humans seemed to wonder why I put a cloth over the statue. I better get this fixed before they find out.

string.name: text
string.value: May 3rd

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Lazy Papa Pixie

string.name: text
string.value: \nToday I felt like watering the garden, so I headed there, only to see Papa Pixie just sizing up the garden instead of working on the statue.

string.name: text
string.value: He didn't even finish fixing it, and for him to slack off like this? I was so mad I chased him out of the garden. Once the statue is taken care of, I will no doubt kick him out of the tower!

string.name: text
string.value: May 5th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Eak's Lecture

string.name: text
string.value: \nEak was following me around all day, telling me that Star Pixie is indeed acting suspicious and that I should kick him out of the tower immediately. Apparently, he kept on bringing unknown and unwanted pixies into the premise.

string.name: text
string.value: I am not a big fan of Papa Pixie, either, but I was so annoyed by Eak's constant yapper that I decided to ruin his cloud pieces. Hopefully that'll put an end to all that bla bla bla.

string.name: text
string.value: May 7th

string.name: text
string.value: #eTitle : Restoring the Statue

string.name: text
string.value: Looking at the busted statue of goddess, Papa Pixie said in order to make a new one, he'll need a new model and asked me for help.

string.name: text
string.value: Apparently, all I need to do is walk into the statue for a second, and he'll use his magic power to sketch it up and make a new one. It doesn't seem like a hard thing to do, so I agreed to do it. Finally!! The statue will be back up by tomorrow!

lighted up a match...

On the next evening... I lead the hot-blooded visitor to the present world. 
Scooping up a gold coin out from the river, 

his name is... #b“The Rememberer”#k...

string.name: text
string.value:
“will be able to read the 
 hidden truth in this book 
...”

string.name: text
string.value:
"this book is about the story of the Legendary Warrior 
 The Story of Sayram...”

string.name: text
string.value: Great Warrior Sayram is the most outstanding swordsman in the history of MapleStory. He had mastered all the warrior classes including Hero, Paladin and Dark Knight, which no others have done before. \nBut his popularity and admiration from the people came not because of this. It is for Sayram's heroic and risky stories which allow the travelers in MapleStory to believe in the true meaning of courage and bravery.

string.name: text
string.value:
And because of this, Sayram's stories were loved and passed on by many. 
Borned in a village among the deep forests in Victoria Island, he had went through countless tough ordeals to become a true hero... Hopefully, Maple travellers will be touched by Sayram's story to self-explore and make great achievements.

string.name: text
string.value: \n- Author -

string.name: text
string.value: #eSky of Griffrey#n

string.name: text
string.value: One day, Sayram arrived in the city of Orbis. In the Garden of Darkness, he saw an animal that he had never seen before! That animal had a long white horn on it's head like an eagle, 4 limbs of a horse, a lion's tail and a pair of large wings on its body. \nDeeply attracted by this animal, Sayram started to approach it slowly. But when the animal saw Sayram, it made a strange scream and starts to attack Sayram to protect itself.

string.name: text
string.value: \n\nThis animal possesses lightning speed, and wields a pair of giant wings that sent out strong gale of wind.

string.name: text
string.value: It was rumored that he first got to know about magic through a travelling magician. Having to arrive at the remotely small village, the magician doesn't seems to be that great afterall, and the magic he saw could be of a basic magic trick! But somehow, it still touches him to see a magical ray created out of nowhere, and through this, he firmly set a target to possess this mysterious strength.

string.name: text
string.value: In order to study magic, he arrived at Ellinia, but there are no magicians willing to take him in. Although the present Ellinia forest should be consider as opened, compared to its past when the Ellinia forest is a more secluded environment. To everyone, he was just a naive countryside kid who knows nothing about magic.

string.name: text
string.value: But he has never given up. The passion for learning magic has made him work even harder. So, he settled down in Ellinia and goes around researching on his magical studies. The people teased his eagerness. But not long after, the people around could not help but to agree with him, because... by the time he completed his first round of research, people became more aware of his talent!

string.name: text
string.value: During that time, Grendel the Really Old who is the elder of Ellinia, believed that he can attain and become an outstanding magician, and also entrust him with many matters. He loves to research on magic that can revive the forest, and also provides lots of help to the magical forest. Besides Ellinia, the magical forest, in order to create forest in other region, he start to research on related issues.

string.name: text
string.value: To have flowers to blooming in a deserted area... should be a difficult matter! In order to obtain more magical knowledge, he started researching on ancient magic, working hard to understand the books of magic research, and also obtained suitable result. During that time... he was named the Genius of Ellinia.

string.name: text
string.value: The Genius of Ellinia Forest! With the ability of his talent, he completed his second, third and fourth advancement within a short time period. Nobody is able to beat his time record. Yet, he shows no arrogance, and continue to research on more advanced magic. He... has always hungered for higher levels of magic...

string.name: text
string.value: However... could this never-satisfying of hunger for magic... caused an adverse effect? In order to obtain more powers, he gets contact with the forbidden ancient book! For other people, even they could obtain that ancient book, they will not be able to understand the content. But... because of what of a talent he is, he was able to self-learnt the ancient magic... After obtaining the power... he did not know realised the actual fact that it is a Dark Force...

string.name: text
string.value: The force of the black magic starts to control him slowly, gradually causing his personality to change. He used to be a cheerful and bright guy, deeply concentrating in his research, but he gradually changes into an extremely moody guy. People thought that his changed of personality was a result of over-tiredness, and never start to think strangely...

string.name: text
string.value: In the end... the black magic had fully controlled him, and he now could not use the original magic he has. But he couldn't reverse back the time, he could only immerse deeply into the practice of black magic, and now... he had made a grave mistake which cannot be reversed.

string.name: text
string.value: He had spent a part of his life creating new magic skills... Isn't he aware that the force he had created could harm the world? In the end... he suffered for his own fate!

string.name: text
string.value: For him, who has lost his human appearance, he decided to seek the punishments from the elders. Gritto proposed of destroying him, but Grendel the Really Old could not bear to do it to his beloved disciple. Hence, it was decided to seal all his magic skills and he will be watched by the Elders. As a talented magician, his future has definitely gone to a waste.

string.name: text
string.value: In the end... I am unable to write down the name of this rare talented magician in the historical record book...This is deeply regretted...

string.name: text
string.value: Date: I have forgotten about the day... and month...

string.name: text
string.value: Author: The world's most talented scientist Hughes. There's no other scientist in this world who is able to overtake me! Hahaha~

string.name: text
string.value: Manufacture target: The black fog is the revolution of the Physic Synthesis! Mechanism Innovation! All science innovation! The manufacturing black fog, has bring the science revolution to a new height...! I think...

string.name: text
string.value:
Materials: 1 Scavenger Fan 
100 black ink
50 Screws
1Long lasting dry cell batteries
50gears
10propellers
20steels

string.name: text
string.value: Suggesting to prepare sufficiently for convenience sake!

string.name: text
string.value: Manufacture methods: Refer to illustration artwork attached.

string.name: text
string.value: Important notes before manufacturing

string.name: text
string.value: 1. Connects lots of materials from the fierce propellers, make sure all of it are steel! Please don't make mistakes to substitute steel by lead or copper because the price for steel is too high. If you don't put enough effort, you may damage the black fog manufacturing device.

string.name: text
string.value: 2. Manufacturing of long lasting batteries is difficult, therefore suggesting making the batteries in advance! If there's no way you could make the batteries, be it buy or make it, also must try to find a solution to obtain it!

string.name: text
string.value: 3. Even it is not the long lasting batteries, using a normal batteries will do so too, but to change the batteries often is troublesome! Because... every time you change the batteries, you will need to re-organize the machine again!

string.name: text
string.value: 4. Required pure ink that was not blend with sundry goods! Please do not think that you want to create some bubbly effect and adds in detergent or things that create the bubbly effect... if not careful, you will not creating black fog, but creating white clouds! #r Very Important! #k

string.name: text
string.value: Application methods: You must simultaneously press down the button behind the black fog manufacturing device, as well as the button beneath it and the button that is not easily seen. After that, pull the handle 3 times, After 10 seconds, press the button behind the device for 5 times, the button on top for 2 times, the button below for 16 times. For other contents, please refer to the illustration artwork of the operating procedure. If you think that the mentioned methods are too troublesome, hit the manufacturing device twice!

string.name: text
string.value: After use: It may create black fog, the person who used it might also obtain the skill to control the black fog. I'll have no other way, if the person is unable to obtain it.

string.name: text
string.value: Quote from the author: The person who has a grateful heart, respect the person with talent, please use it well~

string.name: text
string.value: Ever heard of the Lava Essence?

string.name: text
string.value:
It is the world hottest liquid! 
it is uncontrollable even with any powerful strength! 
it can melt even the world strongest force! 
The Sun!

string.name: text
string.value:
The strength of the flame that is blazing hot forever... 
nobody actually knew how it was produced... 
when it was produced... 
its originality... 

in order to obtain that formidable strength, many magicians had went to challenged it, but all of them just can't obtain it!

string.name: text
string.value:
Its hotness is unbearable to mankind... 
in a place deep down beneath the land... 
with the strength of a human, they will not be able to control it. 
not even to obtain it~

string.name: text
string.value: In a place deep down beneath the land, from the melting of lava that created it... the only method to obtain it... will be by using all the snow from an ice field to cool it down. \n but... because of it being in a place deep down beneath the land, it will eventually has its weakness... \n at the center of the place deep down beneath the land, is the place where the lava essence flows out...

string.name: text
string.value:
Although this is only a small scrap fragment, but the strength hidden in it... is enough to melt a mountain... 

the magician to possess the skill to control the flame~ 
if you want to control all the flames in this world, you will have to consume the lava essence!

string.name: text
string.value:
Only if the hot lava is trapped in your body... 
with the hot lava in your body... 
 will be the only method to control the flame! 

if you do not has its courage, 
you will not have the quality to control it!

string.name: text
string.value:
Do you know about the ancient iceberg? 
It was the world most coldest ice... 
you will not be able to breaks it with any power... 
the only way will be... 
the moon...

string.name: text
string.value:
That eternal cold strength... 
nobody know how it was produced... 
and when it was produced... 
its originality... 

 in order to obtain that formidable strength, many magicians had went to challenged it, but all of them just can't obtain it!

string.name: text
string.value:
It can be located at the place where the coldness is unbearable... 
and in the extremely cold and dangerous ice canyon, 
with the strength of a human... they will not be able to reach there. 

Standing tall at the ice canyon... to be able to destroy it, you will need to have the hammer that is made specially by giant...

string.name: text
string.value:
But... There's weaknesses in it due to it been under the sun shine for so long! 
Even for an ancient iceberg... that resembled a hard statue will too have its fissure, 

the person who possess the cold ice magic~ 
if you want to possess all the magic that controlled cold ice... 
you will have to consume the ice stone powder from the ancient ice!

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nLately, I've had recurring thoughts...was it a mistake to fall deeply in love with a Fairy? I confess that I did not count on suddenly being so aware of my lifespan in comparison to that of an immortal. It's funny that I worry already about what would most likely happen in 40-50 years, but... I am afraid of one day leaving Phyllia for good. Such a painful goodbye...perhaps there is a way to avert it...

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nPhyllia is pregnant! I am filled with joy and curiosity to see how he or she will look. Phyllia mentioned how rare it is to have a baby between a Fairy and a human being, and she feels that it's a blessing from the Goddess, but... why can't I shake off this uneasy feeling? Since the baby is half Fairy, the baby should live a long time...but just thinking about leaving Phyllia and my child by themselves makes me queasy.

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nI began new research on extending one's lifespan. Some magicians were able to succeed in doing so, but...no known alchemists so far that have succeeded in this. (Alcaster did, but he's a magician as well...) Unlike magic, alchemy is a field where one needs to pay a price in order to achieve the desired result. I'll just have to put my faith in the power of Alcadno.

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nI didn't even know where to start in terms of prolonging one's life, so I decided on a multiple experiment approach. Medicine and potions will be a good start, and I began working with Russellon. However, I have met another fellow, with a variety of bright ideas. Maybe it's because he's a wandering alchemist who travels the world, but his opinions and views are radical. Change the human body into a machine?

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nThe research is not going as well as I hoped. Failure seems to lurk around every bend, no matter the road. Changing the human body into a machine works in theory, but not in reality thus far. Any living organism converted into a machine simply ceases to be human. There's no point in prolonging my life through this procedure. What good would I be as a mindless husk? I would never be able to hear my lover laugh again, or cry...what will I do?

string.name: text
string.value: ...This is driving me crazy. I don't see this experiment working out. Phyllia's stomach is getting bigger and bigger by day. I am getting nervous. Too nervous. This is driving me insane.

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nMy precious child opened her eyes for the first time today. With her blonde hair and milky white skin...she looks exactly like Phyllia, ever with her tiny wings. She is the most beautiful thing I have ever seen. We decided to name her Keeny. Phyllia is quite fond of the name...says its "fitting for a fairy". I must find a way to prolong my life, so I might see my child grow. But how? I will need a breakthrough soon...

string.name: text

I never knew a baby could be this beautiful and lovable... After discussing with Phyllia, we decided to name her Keeny. Phyllia seemed ecstatic that we came up with a name that really fits her. .. I need the long lifespan now more than ever, for the sake of this kid... and yet, I do not make any progress with this experiment.

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nWhile passing through the lab in the basement, I found a strange, ancient passage that I didn't notice before. It looked like a passage that was used a long time ago... It appears to link the two societies, as wel as lead further underground. Never knew there was a place like this in Magatia. It seems shrouded in secrecy, and thus, such a secret bears further investigation.

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nI decided to explore the previously unknown, seemingly endless, underground passage. After descending for what seemed like an eternity, I encountered a mysterious cave... It looked like someone conducted an experiment there. I didn't know a place like this existed underneath Magatia. After cleaning up the hopelessly messy cave, I realized there was a wealth of old data lying around here. What secrets are hidden among these pages?

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \n...I found out an amazing, no, terrifying truth. The lab I walked into through the underground passage was the lab where the Black Magician concocted his schemes. I can't believe it. The lab of that evil human being actually still exists...? Then I came back to my senses, and realized that the Black Magician, who put a terror into everyone's lives for hundreds of years in Ossyria, may know a thing or two about extending one's lifespan.

string.name: text
string.value: ...I have started to really delve into the research data the Black Magician came up with... I knew deep in my heart that I shouldn't do this, but... as long as I can extend my lifespan...

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \n...The records that the Black Magician left behind... they seem eerily similar, even though he came up with these hundreds of years ago. Why is that? It's convenient in that it's easy to duplicate... but... something inside me feels not right about this.

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nThe alchemy of Magatia, and that of the Black Magician. The more I uncover, the more the link appears to be irrefutable. Hopefully I am wrong, I do not wish our alchemy to be in any way shape or form related to that evil being. I am even more disturbed about this hidden disciple, who wished to combine this terrible magic with advanced technology. He vanished just as suddenly as he appeared...but where could he have gone?

string.name: text
string.value: My fears are now confirmed. Not only is the alchemy of Magatia based upon the Black Magician, the very foundations of this land are steeped in his power. For a deserted, dry land like this with no oasis to have a town like this... has to be because of the Black Magician. That evil Black Magician...for his work to be the genesis of what we all do these days...is that really the inconvenient truth about Magatia?

string.name: text
string.value: ...What would happen if the world found out that I had been using the studies of Black Magician to extend my lifespan? I actually entertained the thought of that... and I realized I would be the object of scorn from everyone in this land. The alchemists of Alcadno, Zenumist, the head of the Alcadno Society, even Russellon...even the wandering alchemist will spit at me. Even with all that... if the experiment worked out... if it worked out... then...

string.name: text
string.value: X/X/XX \nLately, I've had recurring thoughts...was it a mistake to fall deeply in love with a Fairy? I confess that I did not count on suddenly being so aware of my lifespan in comparison to that of an immortal. It's funny that I worry already about what would most likely happen in 40-50 years, but... I am afraid of one day leaving Phyllia for good. Such a painful goodbye...perhaps there is a way to avert it...

I thought it'd be possible to change the human body into a machine, but... it works in theory, for sure. The problem is, the experiments never end up like my theory. Any living organism that has been converted into a machine loses its identity, and ceases to move around. If that's the case, there's no point of obtaining a long lifespan through this procedure. I am looking for a way for me to see Phyllia's face, hear Phyllia's voice, and engage her in meaningful conversations for a long, long time... is that possible?
