string.name: text
string.value: Legend of the Snail

string.name: text
string.value: Unbeknownst to many Maple World travelers is a peculiar creature. When I was young, I came across one of these. It was a snail but much larger and older...It has been said that it has the longest life span amongst all Maple World snails.

string.name: text
string.value: Since I was young, I was always drawn to the snails. This one time when I was observing the little creature at a close distance, I noticed something. The snail was leaving a trail of snail shells of which some were green, blue, and red. But there was this one shell that stood out amongst the rest.

string.name: text
string.value: That shell had an array of rainbow colors. Its colors are so captivating that you know it's very valuable at first glance. Its value is cannot be compared with any treasure or jewel. I took that snail shell and guarded it with my life.

string.name: text
string.value: When I used the shell... I was able to achieve anything I wished to. The rainbow snail shell made all my hopes and desires come true! The thing I wished for was...!

string.name: text
string.value: Song : Twinkle Twinkle Little Star

string.name: text
string.value:
Twinkle, twinkle, little star, how I wonder what you are!
#bCCGG AAG FFEE DDC#k

Up above the world so high,
#bGGFFEED#k

like a diamond in the sky.
#bGGFFEED#k

Twinkle, twinkle, little star, how I wonder what you are.
#bCCGG AAG FFEE DDC#k

string.name: text
string.value: #eA Guide to Using the Maker Skill#n

string.name: text
string.value:
-Written by -
Vaughn Lee, Stan & Louie

string.name: text
string.value: #e1. What is the Maker Skill?#n

string.name: text
string.value: It's a skill that allows you to create an item through the fundamentals of alchemy. All you need are materials and a small fee, and you're set.

string.name: text
string.value: #e2. How to make the Monster Crystal#n

string.name: text
string.value: (1) Select [Monster Crystal]-[Monster Crystal] in the Maker Skill window.\n(2) Go to your Inventory and move the 100+ items that you've won by fighting level 31+ monsters to the Maker Skill window. \n(3) Click on the 'Make' button and you will have a Monster Crystal.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k Remember, there is, in fact, a chance that you may end up making a higher-leveled Monster Crystal!\n#bTip.#k Also, note that not all quest items or items dropped by monsters can be used.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) Go to the Maker Skill window and click on the type and name of equipment item you would like to make for yourself. \n(2) Select all the materials you will need to make the equipment item. Check each material. If you are missing some of the required materials, you will find that the icon for that material is in gray. \n (3) Click on the 'Make' button and your equipment item should be ready to go!

string.name: text
string.value: #e3. How to Make Equipment Items#n

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k By registering an accelerator or an upgraded gem, you can make yourself a higher quality item with better options.

string.name: text
string.value: #e4. How to Make Upgraded Gems#n

string.name: text
string.value: (1) Go to the Maker Skill window and click on the type and name of the upgraded gem you would like to make for yourself.\n (2) Check to see if you have all the required materials for making the gem. If you are missing some of the required materials, you will find that the icon for that material is in gray. \n (3) Click on the 'Make' button and your upgraded gem should be ready to go!

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k Note that there is always the chance that you may end up making yourself an intermediate grade or high grade gem!\n#bTip.#k If you collect at least 10 upgraded gems for yourself, you'll be able to refine them and turn them into an even higher grade gem.

string.name: text
string.value: #e5. How to Disassemble Equipment Items#n

string.name: text
string.value: (1) Go to the Maker Skill window and click on the [Disassemble] - [Monster Crystal]. \n (2) Place the item you would like to disassemble in the ? slot. \n (3) Click on the 'Make' button and disassemble your equipment item to extract a Monster Crystal from it.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k The higher the quality of the equipment item, the more Monster Crystals you'll be able to extract!

string.name: text
string.value: #e6. What is an accelerator?#n

string.name: text
string.value: (1) You don't need an accelerator or an upgraded gem to make yourself an item. All you need are the required materials.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) If you do not use the accelerator, there is always the chance that the newly made item may end up with either a better or worse set of options.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) Use the accelerator and you will definitely end up with an item with better options. If, however, the process is unsuccessful, the materials used for making the item will disappear.

string.name: text
string.value: Keep in mind that this method of making items involves a lot of trial-and-error. Combine various types and numbers of materials to see what kind of item you end up with! If you are unsuccessful and you do not get any items in the end, you won't end up losing any of the materials.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k You can always use an accelerator or upgraded gems, but with that comes the possibility that your item will be destroyed.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSantapedia Volume 2#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Family Tree#k

string.name: text
string.value: Very little is known about Santa Claus's family, other than his wife.

string.name: text
string.value: According to S.Y. Johnson, Director of Sales at the Maple Herald, and one of the top journalists in all of Maple World, there IS a small cadre of people who speak to Santa Claus directly once every year.

string.name: text
string.value: Johnson could not reveal the names of anyone involved, but he was very resolved on their reliability. He was even able to provide a small anecdote from Santa’s life.

string.name: text
string.value: When Santa Claus made his first trip to Finland, he saw a beautiful woman working alone on Christmas Eve in an old sock factory. She was a poor woman, from a poor neighborhood, where children did not even have socks of their own to hang on the chimneys for Christmas Eve. Many of them did not even have chimneys!

string.name: text
string.value: This lovely woman, with a heart of gold, stayed up the entire night to weave socks for every child in her neighborhood. When Santa Claus saw her, it was love at first sight. It’s said that he proposed to her that very night. The couple then started their new life in Happyville, on the day after Christmas, but she would only move on one condition... Mrs. Claus would make socks in the Santa’s factory for all the Maplers in Maple World.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSantapedia Volume 3#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bChristmas Socks#k

string.name: text
string.value: If there’s one Christmas tradition that Maplers go gaga for every year, it’s getting presents in their Christmas Socks. Unlike the ridiculously named ‘stockings’ of other worlds, these Socks are made from enchanted weavings that act as a sort of beacon for Santa Claus.

string.name: text
string.value: Once hung on a chimney, they continuously fill the air with cheer and joy, feeding off of the good deeds done by their owners each year.

string.name: text
string.value: A Christmas Sock must meet many standards in order to entice Old St. Nic. They must be strong, ample, and never worn to the gym.

string.name: text
string.value: The standard in all sock-making was set, of course, by Mrs. Claus herself. Her designs from the Happyville sock factory can hold any size, shape, or weight, and truly remain on the forefront of sock technology.

string.name: text
string.value: The following pages contain her two guidelines for producing a quality sock.

string.name: text
string.value: 1. The Right Frame: The frame is the basic pattern and master key used to make all socks of the same, and correct size. The artisan who first created the sock’s unique shape has long since retired, but Mrs. Claus is willing to lend frames from her personal collection upon request. \r\n

string.name: text
string.value: 2. The Right Knitting Ball: The qualified knitting ball is the only sanctioned material for creating socks of the proper caliber. This specific batch of twine is only possessed by NooNoo the Snowman, who roams freely about Happyville. Accept no substitutes in this material, or your sock will only be good for getting lost in the laundry!

string.name: text
string.value: #bSantapedia Volume 4#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Claus, Who Is He? #k

string.name: text
string.value: There is only one person, outside the residents of Happyville, who has made contact with Santa Claus. According to source S.Y. Johnson, Santa has made contact with a reporter at the Maple Herald.

string.name: text
string.value: From analysis of history, and his annual reports, some facts can be ascertained. Santa Claus is most definitely an optimistic and giving person. His description as a large, and bearded gentleman is accurate, and he is known to have twinkling eyes. It is believed that only Mrs. Claus has seen the true face of her dear husband. \r\n\r\n

string.name: text
string.value: When the busy Christmas season is over, Santa Claus is known to reply to letters from children all over the world. He spends a great deal of time caring for his reindeer and making repairs to his sleigh. And, of course, much of his time is spent preparing next year’s Naughty or Nice list. \r\n

string.name: text
string.value: According to reports, this Christmas has been particularly busy for the crimson dynamo, and he has been seen relaxing at the tree in Happyville to regain his Christmas cheer. Nothing brings the man joy more than giving presents to children, and admiring the majesty of a well-lit evergreen.\r\n

string.name: text
string.value: But one troubling fact sticks out from this information. Maplers across the world do not believe in Santa like they used to. Santa himself has expressed his wish for Maplers all over to believe in the spirit of Christmas, and to spread his message of love across all of Maple World. Mrs. Claus has even sent out a call for letters, to show support for the man in red.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSantapedia Volume 5#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bGood Deeds and You#k

string.name: text
string.value: In case the reader is unfamiliar with the ways of being nice to others, a few simple tasks can put you in St. Nic’s good graces.

string.name: text
string.value: The following is a list of \nSanta-approved good deeds:

string.name: text
string.value:
- Help your parents with a problem
- Study hard
- Do something nice for your siblings and friends
- Obey traffic laws
- Do not use vulgar words
- Do not tell lies
- Do not be greedy
- Be nice to animals

string.name: text
string.value: Once your deeds are done, and the goodness is in your heart, you will want to prepare for presents!

string.name: text
string.value: First, craft or procure the correct Christmas Socks.

string.name: text
string.value: Second, hang these Socks by the chimney.

string.name: text
string.value: Third, continue to do as many good deeds as you can, to show Santa Claus how much you believe in Christmas.

string.name: text
string.value: There are many other things you can do to gain Santa's favor. And a little fame never hurts when you're competing with a list the size of the entire world. Do every Christmas quest you can, and Santa is sure to shine his light upon you!

string.name: text
string.value: Have fun and happy holidays!

string.name: text
string.value: #bSantapedia Volume 6#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bAppendix : Santa Claus town in Finland#k

string.name: text
string.value: According to the Maple Herald, Santa Claus lives in a town called Rovaniemi in Finland. This is where he can be found, taking care of his reindeer and preparing for his annual jaunt across the globe.

string.name: text
string.value: As the Christmas season approaches, millions of letters pour into the town, and Santa does his best to write back to every single one of them. \r\n

string.name: text
string.value: Any Maplers who wish to contact Santa Claus can send their letters to the following address: \r\n Santa Claus - Main Post Office \r\n 96930 Napapiiri, Finland.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSantapedia Volume 1#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bRosy Cheeks and a Big Heart#k

string.name: text
string.value: \nLittle real information is known about Santa Claus. This red-suited father of Christmas has made his tour around the world with his sleigh and reindeer (Rudolph included), putting gifts under trees and hanging from chimneys alike.

string.name: text
string.value: But a document discovered in Germany may have the secrets of this festive dynamo! From the excerpts of what appears to be a Diary of Santa Claus, even the big man himself did not seem to know why he started giving out presents to children.

string.name: text
string.value: Experts examining the diary believe that Santa was experiencing recurring dreams. They predicted that this could be the key to unravelling the secrets of Santa Claus!

string.name: text
string.value: The following is a page from his diary referring to the dream.

string.name: text
string.value: Year XXXX / Date unknown

string.name: text
string.value: What a jolly, jumping time! Tonight I dreamed the dream I always have, and it was just as wonderful as it always is! Twas the 6th of December, in the great land of Turkey. I rode my flying horse through the sky, hunting with a band of my greatest friends, the divine beings! And what a funny bunch they were, laughing and calling me Odin, their lord supreme!

string.name: text
string.value: Tired from our hunt, and wanting for rest, we set down on the roof of a beautiful home to let our horses catch their breath. And lo, what did I find? A bounty of boots hung by the chimney, all piled high with heaps of carrots, grass, and sugar! Twas as if they had known we would visit their rooftop all along! With our horses well fed and our spirits high, we left them treats of our own. Candies and gifts for the children of the house.

string.name: text
string.value: a beautiful dream, but one that changed! As we flew across the world, my followers called me many different names. When we reached Germany, they called me Saint Nicolas! In the Netherlands, they called me Sinterklass. It’s funny that all of these names sound like my original name, Santa Claus. Ho ho ho!

string.name: text
string.value: Unfortunately, my dream ended as it always did, with Johnson, my Director of Sales, coming to tell me about the latest quotas...

string.name: text
string.value: #eCygnus Knights' Book Volume 1#n

string.name: text
string.value: A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.

string.name: text
string.value: \n#e#bWho are you?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: My name is Cygnus. This is the first volume of my books that contain my thoughts. I am the emperor of Maple World although some call me the young empress.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWho is the Black Mage?#k

string.name: text
string.value: He tried to destroy the entire world long time ago... There are hardly any documents left about him now. Things written about the Black Mage were so vile and evil that people didn't want to even think about it.

string.name: text
string.value: However, if the Black Mage is to be resurrected, that will truly be a nightmare no one wants to think about. Until now, a small group of elite knights have fought against the Black Mage, but the power of the mage is growing stronger.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bElite knights?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: It's a group of knights I created in order to defeat the Black Mage. They are called 'Cygnus Knights'. It's made up of people with different jobs and they fight against the Mage's followers. Lately, it seems like the knights are getting tired.

string.name: text
string.value: So I've been recruiting for more knights. Black Mage's followers are those who are trying to resurrect him.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWhere can I meet you?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Ereve... A drifting island that has been enabled by the spirit's power to float around. Because of the spirit's power and the power of the Benedict, any monsters or the Black Mage cannot enter. Once I'm ready to recruit more knights, I am planning to settle down in one spot and start recruiting.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWhat is a Benedict?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Benedict is very large... probably about hundreds of times bigger than you. It's an organism of blessing. Following tradition, Maple's emperor is chosen by the Benedict.

string.name: text
string.value: When the Benedict chooses a person, he or she becomes the emperor of Maple World and the Benedict will always protect them and never abandon them.

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n The Benedict is watching out for me from above Ereve right now as we speak.

string.name: text
string.value: #eCygnus Knights' Book Volume 2#n

string.name: text
string.value: A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWho are the Cygnus Knights?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: The Black Mage, who brought chaos to Maple World in the past, is about to be resurrected. According to our tactician, Nineheart, this state of peace will not last forever. Before the Black Mage is awoken again, we must grow our strength.

string.name: text
string.value: So in order to raise an army that will be able to fight against the Black Mage, I am recruiting for the Cygnus Knights.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bCan anyone become a knight?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Any maple adventurer can become a knight but there is one condition. You must at least be level 20 or higher to create a Cygnus Knight character.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bThen does my character transform into a knight?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: No. The knight character must be created as a new character. However, I will use my special spirit powers to connect the character who volunteers for knighthood and the newly created knight character.

string.name: text
string.value: The two characters connected by the spirit's power can help each other as their own levels advance.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bThe spirit's power?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: The original character will gain a skill called the ‘Spirit's Blessing’. This skill increases as the knight character's level increases.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bThen can I volunteer for the knighthood right now?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: No, not yet. We are still in the stage of preparation. Each of the head knights are working hard to finalize the recruitment process.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHead Knight Mihile#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: My faithful knight, Mihile, was born to be a warrior. He was given the spirit's blessing in order to fight evil. Those who first meet him say he's cold and intimidating, but he is my faithful knight with a good heart who is always protecting me.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHead Knight Oz#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Oz who used to be a Mage from the heavens has been blessed by the spirit of fire. He is such a friendly and gentle mage. He gets in trouble by Irena sometimes because he forgets to do his job

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHead Knight Irena#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Irena is an archer who has received the blessing of the spirit of wind. She often helps out with Oz's work who is a bit clumsy.

string.name: text
string.value: \n\nShe is always clam and objective and has a very beautiful heart.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHead Knight Eckhart#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Eckhart is a thief who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of darkness. It's hard to see his face because it's always covered with a thief mask. Because of his sarcastic remarks, sometimes he and Mihile butt heads but his heart is still very sincere.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHead Knight Hawkeye#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: Hawkeye, who has been blessed by the spirit of lightning, is a cheerful pirate. He is always lightening up the mood of the knighthood.

string.name: text
string.value: However, when I give him an assignment, he takes it as seriously as anyone. He is a great knight.

string.name: text
string.value: #eCygnus Knights' Book Volume 3#n

string.name: text
string.value: A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.

string.name: text
string.value: \n#e#bWhat is a Dawn Warrior?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: A Dawn Warrior is swordsman who is one with the spirit of light. They are led by Mihile who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of light to fight against evil. Dawn Warriors draw the power of light on their sword.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWhat is a Blaze Mage?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: A Blaze Mage is a mage that is one with the spirit of fire. They are led by Oz who has been bestowed with the burning power of the spirit of fire. These mages can use their magic to increase the spirit's power and freely control it.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWhat is a Wind Archer?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: A Wind Archer is an archer who is one with the spirit of wind. They are led by Irena who has been bestowed with the blessing of the ever freely flowing spirit of wind. Wind Archers can concentrate the spirit's power on their bow to shoot an arrow with great force.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWhat is a Night Walker?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: A Night Walker is a thief who is one with the spirit of darkness. They are led by Eckhart, who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of darkness. They can fight against enemies who cannot be destroyed with the power of light. Night Walkers can not only use the spirit's power, but they can shoot out a powerful poison as well.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bWhat is a Thunder Breaker?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: A Thunder Breaker is a pirate who is one with the spirit of lightning. They are led by Hawk Eye, who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of lightning which controls the power of electricity to strike an enemy.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bI think I know all of them now.#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: You have read all the books on the Cygnus Knights. By using the 'Cygnus Knight Quiz' book which will be dropped shortly, you can take the quiz and also receive reward as well. I wish you good luck. Until the recruitment for the knighthood begins, may the spirit's blessing be with you...

string.name: text
string.value: #eNoblesse Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What is a Noblesse?#k#l
#L3##b2. Basic Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What is an Item?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l
#L14##b5. What is Job Advancement?#k#l
#L15##b6. 1st Job Advancement#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1. What is a Noblesse?

string.name: text
string.value: While a Noblesse may start out weak, their potential is great. They start with limited skills, but by training in the Forest of Beginning, they'll eventually be powerful enough to join the ranks of the honorable knighthood.

string.name: text
string.value: When training in the Forest of Beginning has been completed, Noblesses will move to Ereve to experience the larger world. They will also obtain more skills by

string.name: text
string.value: making a Job Advancement. Even the strongest Knights began their careers as Noblesses. Work hard so you can be like them!

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2-1. Basic Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft, Right Arrow#n : Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n : Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl #n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE #n: Open Equipment window
#eI #n: Open Item window
#eS #n: Open Ability window
#eK #n: Open Skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, assign one of the Hotkeys with a 'Use' item or a skill for easy access to the item or the skill.

string.name: text
string.value: 2-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the commands below in the chat window to use the corresponding functions.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n : Talk in regular chat mode.
#e/buddy#n : Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n : Talk to party members.
#e/guild#n : Talk to guild members.
#e/whisper [charcater name]#n : Talk to a particular person.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n : Check the login status of the character and the character's current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Request a trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinfo#n : Display information about current party members.\n#e/makeparty#n : Create a new party.\n#e/leaveparty#n : Leave the current party.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinvite#n : Invite a new party member.#b(Party Leader)#k\n#e/partyexpell#n : Kick a party member out of the party.#b(Party Leader)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 3. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Items#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP / MP, scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied and then the item will dissappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc. Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text
string.value: These items don't do much by themselves but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Items#n\n Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash. #k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 4. AP and SP

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to one of these categories: Strength(STR), Dexterity(DEX), Intelligence(INT), Luck(LUK), MaxHP, MaxMP. Earn 6 points each time you level up. #e#bAuto-Assign#k#n Press this to have the game automaticaly assign AP for you.

string.name: text
string.value: #bStrength(STR)#k - Essential for equipping heavy weapons or armor. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Dawn Warriors and Thunder Breakers.

string.name: text
string.value: #bDexterity(DEX)#k - The higher this stat, the higher your accuracy and avoidability. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Wind Archers.

string.name: text
string.value: #bIntelligence(INT)#k - The higher this stat, the higher the success ratio of magic attacks. It also increases Max MP and the amount of MP gained at each level up. The most important stat for determining the magic attack strength of Blaze Wizards.

string.name: text
string.value: #bLuck(LUK)#k - The higher this stat, the higher your avoidability. It also decreases the amount of EXP lost when a character dies. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Night Walkers.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to skills after the 1st Job Advancement. 1 point is given with the 1st Job Advancement and 3 points are given each time you level up after that.

string.name: text
string.value: 5. What is a Job Advancement?

string.name: text
string.value: A Job Advancement can be performed once you reach a certain level. Job Advancements are made as follows: #r1st advancement at Level 10, 2nd advancement at Level 30, 3rd advancement at Level 70#k

string.name: text
string.value: Job Advancements allow you to learn new skills and equip new weapons corresponding to your job.

string.name: text
string.value: It also increases HP / MP, attack / defense, and the number of inventory slots you have.

string.name: text
string.value: 6. 1st Job Advancement

string.name: text
string.value: In order to make your 1st Job Advancement, you must leave the Forest of Beginning and head to Ereve.

string.name: text
string.value: Simply leave the Forest of Beginning to enter Ereve.

string.name: text
string.value: Next, move to the NPC that will give you your Job Advancement.

string.name: text
string.value: (1)#eDawn Warrior#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bMihile#k in Ereve to learn about the Dawn Warrior.

string.name: text
string.value: (2)#eBlaze Wizard#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bOz#k in Ereve to learn about the Blaze Wizard.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#eWind Archer#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bIrena#k in Ereve to learn more about the

string.name: text
string.value: Wind Archer.\n

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#eNight Walker#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bEckhart#k in Ereve to learn more about the Night Walker.

string.name: text
string.value: (5)#eThunder Breaker#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bHawkeye#k in Ereve to learn more about the Thunder Breaker.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the time of your 1st Job Advancement, #byour AP will be redistributed depending on what job you picked.#k After that, it would be smart to put your AP into the stats that enhance your new job.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k If you wait until Lv. 30 to make your Job Advancement, you will not receive the SP corresponding to previous levels. Therefore, we recommend that you make your 1st Job Advancement as soon as you reach the eligible level.

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #eLegend's Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What's a Legend?#k#l
#L3##b2. Simple Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What are Items?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l
#L14##b5. What's a Job Advancement?#k#l
#L15##b6. Guide to 1st Job Advancement#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1. What's a Legend?

string.name: text
string.value: The Legend is a historic figure known to have sealed up the Black Wizard in the past. Unfortunately, due to the curse of the Black Wizard, the Legend ended up losing all his skills and memories, and was sealed up inside a block of ice for centuries until one day when Lilin came to his rescue.

string.name: text
string.value: After waking up at Rien and experiencing the new world firsthand, you will complete the training both at the Cold Forest and the training center to make the first job advancement. Then, you'll slowly remember the abilities and skills that once made you a Legend.

string.name: text
string.value: The resurrection of the Black Wizard cannot be prevented unless you recover all of your previous powers that once made you a Legend. Continue training so that one day you'll be back above the rest!

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2-1. Simple Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft/Right Arrows#n : Move left and right
#eUp/Down Arrows#n : Climbing the rope/ladder, use portal
#eAlt#n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 from numpad #n: Pick up item
#eE#n: Open equipment inventory
#e#n: Open item inventory
#eS#n: Open stat window
#eK#n: Open skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k Register your skill or consumable items on the bottom right hand corner of your screen as HotKeys for easy access.

string.name: text
string.value: 2-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the following commands on the chat window to access the following functions.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n : Displays chat to everyone.
#e/buddy#n : Only displays chat to your buddies.
#e/party#n : Only displays chat to your party members.
#e/guild#n : Only displays chat to your guild members.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/whisper [character name]#n : Sends out a whisper.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAct#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n : Displays character's on/offline status along with the user’s current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Sends a request for an item exchange/trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinfo#n : Displays info on all currently enrolled party members.\n#e/makeparty#n : Creates a new party.\n#e/quitparty#n : Quits from the currently enrolled party.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinvite#n : Sends a party invitation.#b(Party Leaders Only)#k\n#e/partyexpel#n : Expels a member from the party.#b(Party Leaders Only)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 3. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Item#n\n An item you can equip on your body. There are two types of equipment items: regular ones that boost your stats, and cash items that are mainly for decorative/accessory purposes.

string.name: text
string.value: In order to equip an equipment item, you must open the equipment window and drag the item onto the corresponding slot, or double-click the item.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #e’Use’ Item#n\n These are consumable items that consist of potions that improve HP/MP, or scrolls that boost the stats of the equipment item. They can be used by simply double-clicking the item. (Since they are disposable items, they’ll disappear after use.)

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc. Item#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, gems, and others. Etc. items cannot be used directly,

string.name: text
string.value: but can be used to benefit your game through quests and NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Items#n\n These are decorative items, sometimes with special effects, that can be purchased through the Cash Shop. #rCash Items can only be purchased with NX Prepaid, which can be charged to your account.#k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 4. AP and SP

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to any of the following categories: Strength (STR), Dexterity (DEX), Intelligence (INT), Luck (LUK), MaxHP, and MaxMP. You’ll receive 5 AP each time you level up. You can press #e#bauto-distribute#k#n to automatically assign the distribution of your AP.

string.name: text
string.value: #bStrength (STR)#k ? A necessary stat for equipping heavy armor and weapons. It’s the most important stat that determines the strength of an Aran's attack.

string.name: text
string.value: #bDexterity (DEX)#k ? The higher this stat, the higher your Accuracy and Avoidability.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nPoints which can be used on skills acquired through job advancements. Starting out as a Legend, no SP will be assigned to you, but make the 1st job advancement and you will receive 1 point. After, each level-up will reward you with 3 Skill Points.

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 5. What's a Job Advancement?

string.name: text
string.value: When you reach a certain level, you will be able to make a job advancement. #rThe 1st job advancement takes place upon reaching Level 10, the 2nd at Level 30, the 3rd at Level 70, and the 4th at Level 120#k.

string.name: text
string.value: Once you make a job advancement, you will not only receive a group of new skills, but also be able to equip weapons that are specifically made for your job.

string.name: text
string.value: Your HP and MP will also receive a uniform boost, as will your attack and defense abilities. You will also be awarded with additional slots in your Inventory.

string.name: text
string.value: 6. Guide to 1st Job Advancement

string.name: text
string.value: To make the 1st job advancement, you must first leave the Ice Cave and head over to Rien.

string.name: text
string.value: To get to Rien, escape the Cold Forest and head to the right from the Field West of Rien.

string.name: text
string.value: There, you must complete the quests given by Lilin in order to achieve the 1st job advancement.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k Once you achieve the 1st job advancement, #byour AP will be redistributed to fit your job#k. Thereafter, it is recommended that you focus on the stats that pertain to your job class when distributing your AP.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k If you make the first job advancement AFTER reaching Level 30, you will not receive the SP that is available to levels below 30. Thus, it’s highly recommended that you make the job advancement as soon as you are eligible.

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #eDragon Types and Characteristics (Vol. I)#n

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n- Leafre Dragon Conservation Union

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents

#b1. Prologue
#b2. Definition of a Dragon
#b3. Dragon Types and Characteristics
#b4. Conclusion

string.name: text
string.value: #e1. Prologue#n

string.name: text
string.value: Travelers of Maple World, what do you think of when you hear the word "Dragon"?

string.name: text
string.value: Do you think of the three-headed incarnation of evil, the vicious Horntail? Do you get the ticklish urge even this moment to go hunt that monster, since Dragons yield such high EXP?

string.name: text
string.value: Ah, but Dragons are not monsters. They are another race of creatures, both wise and intelligent.

string.name: text
string.value: Granted, there are evil monsters that resemble Dragons. But don't write off all Dragons simply because of that. Good and evil exist in every species. Surely, there are some Dragons that can live in peace with us.

string.name: text
string.value: Sadly, some people don't recognize that, and think of all

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons as monsters that ought to be eliminated.

string.name: text
string.value: This book will provide detailed and practical information pertaining to Dragon types and characteristics, allowing you to know which Dragons to avoid and which to befriend.

string.name: text
string.value: Our hope is that this will help prevent misunderstandings and allow all races to live in peace with Dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: #e2. Definition of a Dragon#n

string.name: text
string.value: If you want to learn about the different types of dragons, you must first learn to define what a dragon is. For instance, Lizards have short limbs, a long body, and a tail that resembles a dragon's, but they cannot be regarded as dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons possess reason and emotions, and are capable of communicating with humans.

string.name: text
string.value: That is not true of Lizards, which explains why they can never be dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: In that sense, Drakes, Wyverns, Dragon Turtles, and Newts closely resemble dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: But they are not dragons! While they have sturdy scales and horns, tails, and the ability to exhale powerful breaths, they do not have a dragon's intelligence. Hence, they are known as Quasi Dragons. They are monsters who submit to powerful figures, often seen as the underlings of a real dragon.

string.name: text
string.value: #e3. Dragon Types and Characteristics#n

string.name: text
string.value: There are many ways to categorize Dragons, such as scale color, horn shape, physical build, habitat, and Dragon personality.

string.name: text
string.value: However, since this book is meant for the general population, it will only cover the major types of common and special Dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: A. Common Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Categorizing Dragons by their scale color is the most basic and convenient method of distinguishing Dragon types.

string.name: text
string.value: In Leafre, this method is used to cateogorize and breed dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: Knowing a Dragon's personality can easily help you establish good rapport with the Dragon.

string.name: text
string.value: a. Red Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons with red scales generally have the fire attribute. They must be approached with caution as they tend to be volatile, although they are just and loyal.

string.name: text
string.value: If you have irritated a Red Dragon, beware! The dragon may attack with Fire Breath.

string.name: text
string.value: b. Blue Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons with blue scales generally have the ice attribute. They are perceptive and cold-hearted. They can be petty, so do not get on their bad side.

string.name: text
string.value: c. Green Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons with green scales generally have the wind attribute. They are playful and outgoing. They love forests and do not permit the destruction of nature.

string.name: text
string.value: d. Gold Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons with gold scales generally have the holy attribute. They can be overly carefree, as they are calm and peaceful by nature.

string.name: text
string.value: Gold Dragons will fulfill your requests no matter what, but no one can tell how long it will take.

string.name: text
string.value: e. Black Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: These Dragons have black scales and black horns. While most dragons have horns that are a different color from their scales, #bBlack Dragons are entirely black, including their horns#k.

string.name: text
string.value: These Dragons generally have the darkness attribute, and although they are quiet and considerate, they can be insidious.

string.name: text
string.value: Now please note that this is not the only way to categorize Dragons. There are many Dragons that have scale colors that were not mentioned. Also, some Dragons may look like one of the Dragons mentioned above, yet have completely different personalities and characteristics.

string.name: text
string.value: If you wish to find out more about Dragons not mentioned above, please refer to Dragon Types and Characteristics (Vol. II).

string.name: text
string.value:
Continued in
Dragon Types and Characteristics (Vol. II).

string.name: text
string.value: #eDragon Types and Characteristics (Vol. II)#n

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n- Leafre Dragon Conservation Union

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents

#b1. Prologue
#b2. Definition of a Dragon
#b3. Dragon Types and Characteristics
#b4. Conclusion

string.name: text
string.value: A. Special Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Sometimes, a dragon may physically appear to be a colored dragon yet have completely different characteristics.

string.name: text
string.value: These are known as special dragons.

string.name: text
string.value: a. Serpent Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: While common dragons have plump bodies and long tails, Serpent Dragons more closely resemble a snake with their long body and distinctive facial features. They live by the sea and feed on small fishes.

string.name: text
string.value: Serpent Dragons, who are known for their mild temperament, do not attack first unless you intrude into their territory.

string.name: text
string.value: But they are also fair and logical, so they will permit entry into their territory if you pay a reasonable fee and only if -- they pay the proper fee.

string.name: text
string.value: Serpent Dragons do not have a specific attribute. They use both Ice Breath and Fire Breath, and have resistances to both. It is said they are proficient in magic, although they seldom use it.

string.name: text
string.value: Although it is hard to find Serpent Dragons in Victoria Island and Ossyria, it has been reported that a Serpent Dragon named Leviathan has appeared near Minar Forest.

string.name: text
string.value: b. Onyx Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: At first glance, Onyx Dragons look like Black Dragons because they both have black scales, but Onyx Dragons have gold horns and their scales have a clear and mysterious glow.

string.name: text
string.value: They have the most unique growth process of any Dragon.

string.name: text
string.value: When an Onyx Dragon forms a contract with a person, their souls become linked. As the person grows, the Onyx Dragon grows as well.

string.name: text
string.value: An Onyx Dragon that enters a Spirit Pact will be spiritually linked to that person for eternity. Once that happens, the Onyx Dragon will finally recognize itself as a being and begin to develop intelligence. When its master grows, the Onyx Dragon will grow accordingly.

string.name: text
string.value: A spirit can develop endlessly, so an Onyx Dragon's growth potential is also endless. Onyx Dragons with good masters can acquire unrivaled amounts of power. Unfortunately, Onyx Dragons are said to be extinct.

string.name: text
string.value: c. Mutant Dragons

string.name: text
string.value: Who is the most famous Dragon in all of Maple World? Ask a hundred people and every single one will say, "Horntail"! However, only a handful of people have ever seen Horntail and thus, only a handful of people know that Horntail is a Mutant Dragon.

string.name: text
string.value: Horntail can be categorized as a Black Dragon by its scale color. But because it is a three-headed Dragon, it is recognized as a special Dragon instead of a common Dragon. Each of Horntail's three heads has different abilities, and one of the heads is said to use a powerful luring skill.

string.name: text
string.value: Horntail may be an intelligent Dragon, but it is currently regarded as a monster in Maple World due to its vicious personality. Leafre is constantly recruiting members to join its expeditionary team to defeat Horntail, who has betrayed Nine Spirit and put Minar Forest in danger.

string.name: text
string.value: Of course, it is not easy to challenge Horntail. Currently, Horntail is the most powerful Dragon in Maple World. Of the three Dragon kings, Afrien went missing and Nine Spirit is in the process of recuperating from Horntail's betrayal, so Horntail stands unchallenged in Maple World.

string.name: text
string.value: #e4. Conclusion#n

string.name: text
string.value: Dragons in Maple World have their own thoughts, feelings, and will. Not all Dragons are good, but that isn't a good enough reason to regard all Dragons as monsters.

string.name: text
string.value: We can befriend Dragons, with the right mindset and diplomacy. So study them, and then give it a shot! Your life will surely be enriched.

string.name: text
string.value: <The End>

string.name: text
string.value: #eCrew Member's Voyage Log#n

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n- Written by John, A Retired Crew Member

string.name: text
string.value: This book is a collection of my experiences while out to sea as a crew member. My experiences reveal the thrilling life of a man of the sea, so read it if you wish to live vicariously through my adventures.

string.name: text
string.value: But remember: a true adventurer is someone who has firsthand experience of the world, and not a person who merely reads someone else's voyage log.

string.name: text
string.value: June 29th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I have been on dry land for too long! Soon, I embark on a new voyage. This time, I board the Thunder Bolt under the command of Captain Alpha. He is well known, so I have high hopes for this voyage.

string.name: text
string.value: June 30th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: A lovely day. The voyage is off to a smooth start.

string.name: text
string.value: July 1st - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: The wind is favorable. We're sailing faster than expected. Captain Alpha suggested we take a shortcut and sail through the Karibbean Triangle.

string.name: text
string.value: I'm sure the path is shorter, but that part of the sea is known for its atrocious weather and deadly reefs. That worries me.

string.name: text
string.value: July 2nd - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: We agreed to enter Karibbean Triangle as Captain Alpha suggested. I was nervous, but we haven't encountered any problems thanks to the proficient crew members. Actually, it's going extremely well.

string.name: text
string.value: July 3rd - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: Everything seems peaceful. I worried for nothing.

string.name: text
string.value: July 4th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: The sea is never this calm here. We must have luck on our side. Many crew members, including the Captain, have taken to napping on the deck to bask in the lovely weather.

string.name: text
string.value: July 5th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I've been feeding the sea gulls. Now, they visit me. On land, I scare people with my threatening appearance, but the sea gulls don't care. It's so peaceful, being here with the gulls. And pirates aren't foolish enough to attack a huge ship like ours, so I don't have to worry about that, either..

string.name: text
string.value: July 6th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: We're about to leave the Karibbean Triangle. The expected 20 day voyage has been shortened to 10. I'm glad we followed Captain Alpha's instincts.

string.name: text
string.value: July 7th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I'm so relaxed. I've been fishing. Something isn't quite right, though. The sea gulls have stopped visiting. Are we too far from their home now?

string.name: text
string.value: July 8th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: This sea is much too quiet. I'm uneasy. I mentioned this to one of the guys and he just laughed. I don't know whether I'm being mocked or not. I just hope I'm wrong...

string.name: text
string.value: July 9th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I asked Captain Alpha if he thought anything felt strange to him. He laughed and said I worry too much. I hope he's right. He does have more experience than I do.

string.name: text
string.value: July 10th - A sudden storm!

string.name: text
string.value: We were hit by a ferocious storm! The Thunder Bolt happened to be in the eye of the storm, which explains why the weather was so calm. No wonder those sea gulls stopped visiting. The storm will most likely get stronger. Will we survive this calamity?

string.name: text
string.value: July 11th - Overcast

string.name: text
string.value: When I opened my eyes, I was lying on the shore of a strange island. The Thunder Bolt must be completely wrecked. I wonder if Captain Alpha and the others are okay, but right now, I must worry about myself. This island is covered in ice. I'm freezing! I wrapped myself in a tattered sail I found floating nearby. I still have my harpoon on me, so I can hunt fish. I'm glad I didn't lose my voyage log in the midst of all this.

string.name: text
string.value: July 12th - Overcast, then rainy

string.name: text
string.value: The island is covered in snow. I see some animals and plants but no sign of human life. Could this be a deserted island? I hope not. Anyway, it looks like rain. I should head inland and look for shelter of some sort.

string.name: text
string.value: July 13th - Rainy

string.name: text
string.value: I almost fainted! I hid myself in a cave, but as I wandered deeper, I found a monster. A Dragon! I've only heard of such creatures in fairy tales... Now, before my very eyes, there is a Dragon, frozen in ice. It has #bblack scales and four golden horns#k. Quite intimidating. I'm huddled in a nook near the entrance of the cave because I'm scared to go too close. If it awakens, I can flee outside.

string.name: text
string.value: July 14th - Rainy, then sunny

string.name: text
string.value: Luckily, the Dragon hasn't woken up. I was visited by some friendly faces today. The sea gulls! They recognized me, I think. I fed them some fish, and then a brilliant idea came to me. I ripped a piece of my clothing and wrote a note to whomever, asking them to rescue me. Then I tied it around one of the sea gull's legs. I hope someone finds it.

string.name: text
string.value: July 15th - Overcast, then rainy

string.name: text
string.value: Constant rain. I waited all day by the shore but didn't see a single ship. No one sails through the Karibbean Triangle, so I only have one hope. The sea gulls...

string.name: text
string.value: July 16th - Sunny

string.name: text
string.value: I saw a ship! It reached the shore within seconds. The sea gulls had surrounded the ship and guided it to me. It is indeed a rescue ship! I'm saved! My sea gulls saved my life!

string.name: text
string.value: #eEvan Guide#n

string.name: text

#eLeft, Right Arrows#n: Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrows#n: Climb a rope or ladder, use portal
#eAlt#n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 on NumPad#n: Pick up items
#eE#n: Open Equipment window
#eI#n: Open Item Inventory window
#eS#n: Open Character Stat window
#eK#n: Open Skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k You can easily access Use items and Skills by assigning them to hotkeys located at the bottom right of the screen.

string.name: text
string.value: 1-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Perform various functions by entering the commands provided below into the chat window.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n: Talk in regular chat mode.
#e/buddy#n: Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n: Talk in party chat mode.
#e/Guild#n: Talk in guild chat mode.
#e/whisper [character name]#n: Talk to a particular person.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n: Check whether a character is online and the character's current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n: Request a trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinfo#n: Display information about current party members.\n#e/makeparty#n: Create a new party.\n#e/leaveparty#n: Leave the current party.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinvite#n: Invite a new party member.#b(Party Leader)#k\n#e/partyexpell#n: Kick a party member out of the party.#b(Party Leader)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2. What is an item?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Items#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP/MP, scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied and then the item will disappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text
string.value: These items don't do much by themselves but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Items#n\n Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash. #k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #ePuzzle King Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece A.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rHunt the event monster!#k

string.name: text
string.value: During the 6th Anniversary event, the special monster, #b6th Anniversary Cake#k, appears in all maps and towns in the Maple World. Defeat the monster to obtain #bPuzzle Piece A#k.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece B.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rNPC Inkie sells it!#k

string.name: text
string.value: You can purchase Puzzle Piece B from the NPC Inkie, who appears in town during the 6th Anniversary event. Inkie and Inkwell sell other rare items besides the Puzzle Piece, too, so make sure to visit them!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Pieces C, D, and E.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rDo the MapleStory 6th Anniversary Quest!#k

string.name: text
string.value: Do the repeatable #b'MapleStory 6th Anniversary' quest during the event to receive Puzzle Piece C, D, or E at random. You must complete the whole quest to obtain the Puzzle Piece!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece F.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rPop the Balloon!#k

string.name: text
string.value: Participate in the #b'Balloon Hunt'#k party quest, available only during the 6th Anniversary event! Pop the Balloon to obtain the Puzzle Piece. Make sure to participate, as you can receive a variety of gifts when you win!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece G.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rGrow a Maple Tree!#k

string.name: text
string.value: During the 6th Anniversary period, grow the #bMaple Tree#k on Maple Tree Hill until it pops to obtain Puzzle Piece G.\nIf you give more than 50 Sunshines to the Maple Tree in one day, Aramia can also give you a Puzzle Piece G that day.

string.name: text
string.value: #eCitizen's Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value: Table of Contents\n#L1##b1. Basic Controls#k#l\n#L7##b2. What are Items?#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1-1. Basic Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft, Right Arrow#n: Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n: Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl #n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE #n: Open Equipment window
#eI #n: Open Item window
#eS #n: Open Ability window
#eK #n: Open Skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, assign one of the Hotkeys with a 'Use' item or a skill for easy access to the item or the skill.

string.name: text
string.value: 1-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the commands below in the chat window to use the corresponding functions.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n: Talk in regular chat mode.
#e/buddy#n: Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n: Talk to party members.
#e/guild#n: Talk to guild members.
#e/whisper [character name]#n: Talk to a particular person.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n: Check the login status of the character and the character's current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n: Request a trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/partyinfo#n: Display information about current party members.
#e/makeparty#n: Create a new party.
#e/leaveparty#n: Leave the party
#e/partyinvite [character name]#n: Invite a new party member.#b(Party Leader)#k
#e/partyexpel [character name]#n: Kick a party member out of the party.#b(Party Leader)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Item#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP/MP, Scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied, and then the item will disappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eEtc. Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text
string.value: These items don't do much by themselves, but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4) #eCash Items#n\n Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash.#k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l
